# Get datasource config

Fetches the datasource config for the specified custom datasource.


## Code Samples

### Python (API Client)

```python
from glean.api_client import Glean
import os


with Glean(
    api_token=os.getenv("GLEAN_API_TOKEN", ""),
    instance=os.getenv("GLEAN_INSTANCE", ""),
) as glean:

    res = glean.indexing.datasources.retrieve_config(datasource="<value>")

    # Handle response
    print(res)
```

### Typescript (API Client)

```typescript
import { Glean } from "@gleanwork/api-client";

const glean = new Glean({
  apiToken: process.env["GLEAN_API_TOKEN"] ?? "",
  instance: process.env["GLEAN_INSTANCE"] ?? "",
});

async function run() {
  const result = await glean.indexing.datasources.retrieveConfig({
    datasource: "<value>",
  });

  // Handle the result
  console.log(result);
}

run();
```

### Java (API Client)

```java
package hello.world;

import java.lang.Exception;
import org.openapis.openapi.Glean;
import org.openapis.openapi.models.components.GetDatasourceConfigRequest;
import org.openapis.openapi.models.operations.PostApiIndexV1GetdatasourceconfigResponse;

public class Application {

    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {

        Glean sdk = Glean.builder()
                .apiToken("<YOUR_BEARER_TOKEN_HERE>")
                .instance("<YOUR_GLEAN_INSTANCE_HERE>")
            .build();

        GetDatasourceConfigRequest req = GetDatasourceConfigRequest.builder()
                .datasource("<value>")
                .build();

        PostApiIndexV1GetdatasourceconfigResponse res = sdk.indexing().datasources().retrieveConfig()
                .request(req)
                .call();

        if (res.customDatasourceConfig().isPresent()) {
            // handle response
        }
    }
}
```

### Go (API Client)

```go
package main

import(
	"context"
	"os"
	apiclientgo "github.com/gleanwork/api-client-go"
	"github.com/gleanwork/api-client-go/models/components"
	"log"
)

func main() {
    ctx := context.Background()

    s := apiclientgo.New(
        apiclientgo.WithSecurity(os.Getenv("GLEAN_API_TOKEN")),
        apiclientgo.WithInstance(os.Getenv("GLEAN_INSTANCE")),
    )

    res, err := s.Indexing.Datasources.RetrieveConfig(ctx, components.GetDatasourceConfigRequest{
        Datasource: "<value>",
    })
    if err != nil {
        log.Fatal(err)
    }
    if res.CustomDatasourceConfig != nil {
        // handle response
    }
}
```
